Articles.Content: I’m excited for all the new visuals and planets!
I'm mostly excited for the coming features, but the improvements to the flight and building UI look cool and useful, plus procedural wings.
Excited about the increased depth and complexity that the new terrain and planet tech will bring to KSP 2 and 3rd party mods!
Excited for the stock procedural wings. That is such a HUGE improvment, I can't tell you. Kerbal Flight Simulator!

This may be a little strange but I’m excited for the new terrain generation. From show and tell clips and such it seems to provide much more varied canyons and steep slopes unlike KSP1 which was just mild hills. Will make more interesting gameplay.
Really excited for the multiplayer. Nuking my friends colonies sounds fun
Really looking forward towards the new multiplayer feature, can't wait to test this game out with my friends (well mostly watch theirs rockets disintegrate).
I am excited for stock procedural wings. Axial tilt on planets and moons will hopefully present some interesting challenges as well.
I would like to play this game as I started when this game originally came out when I was 13 giving me a lot of fun in my childhood. I am most excited for Colony building.
I am excited about multiplayer!
Explosions and bases
Looking forward to interstellar travel, and checking out the extreme planets in the other systems.

I’d say I’m most excited about multiplayer because I can finally play with friends. Also pretty hyped for interstellar  travel/ that feeling of being in uncharted territory I’ll get when I leave the Kerbol system for the first time.
I'm excited for more solar systems!
Super excited for interstellar travel!

Very cool.
I'm excited for multiplayer since i have friends
I'm excited for the interstellar travel and multiplayer system! Should add some interesting and fun new experiences to the game
I am excited for the awesome new UI, as well as Multiplayer. Overall, the game itself generally pumps me up!
I am excited for new airplane parts so I can make Jeb repeatedly crash into the ocean
I'm excited for the interstellar system and the new planets to explore, and multiplayer because it will be fun to try and get to the Mun while my friends try and kill me!
I'm excited for colonies and interstellar, in KSP1 I never had any reason to continue saves after the first few Duna/Eve missions.
Hype intensifies \0/ I'm excited to be part of the start of a new ksp journey!
I am excited for procedural wings!

I'm actually excited to test the game as a whole with my current pc. Not all of my specs reach the recommended, or even the minimum in some cases, but I'm a believer that early access is the place to truly put these things to the test for myself.
I am excited for interstellar travel, the Kerbol System is already super fun to explore but it would be so much more fun to explore different star systems as well.
